data.quote: Quiet people have the loudest minds.
data.author: Stephen King

data.quote: Every great dream begins with a dreamer. Always remember, you have within you the strength, the patience, and the passion to reach for the stars to change the world.
data.author: Harriet Tubman

data.quote: It is our choices, that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.
data.author: J. K Rowling

data.quote: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
data.author: Joshua J. Marine

data.quote: It is hard to fail, but it is worse never to have tried to succeed.
data.author: Theodore Roosevelt

data.quote: Success is how high you bounce when you hit bottom.
data.author: George S. Patton

data.quote: The three great essentials to achieve anything worthwhile are, first, hard work; second, stick-to-itiveness; third, common sense.
data.author: Thomas A. Edison
